meanings.definition: A person who drinks alcohol excessively.
meanings.sent1: The boozehounds at the party were loud and rowdy.
meanings.sent2: The boozehounds gathered at the bar every Friday night.
meanings.sent3: The boozehounds tried to dance on the tables after one too many drinks.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with boozehounds stumbling home after a night of revelry.
meanings.sent5: The image of the boozehounds laughing and toasting each other was etched in his memory.

meanings.sent1: We saw a pack of boozehounds heading towards the pub.
meanings.sent2: The boozehounds howled at the moon in unison.
meanings.sent3: The boozehounds' footsteps echoed through the empty streets.
meanings.sent4: The field was overrun by boozehounds enjoying a sunny afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the boozehounds running wild brought a smile to her face.
